item.description:
I'm probably not the only one who's going to go hungry on Thanksgiving.

Well this must not stand! The time to eat is at hand!

I'll be going to Rasoi's vegan Indian buffet this Saturday for lunch.

Would anyone like to join me?

We'll meet outside the restaurant at 11:15, make a little smalltalk and then enter the restaurant when it opens at 11:30. I've been told that reservations are not necessary by the staff, so none were made.

This would be a great time for some of our newer members to show up! I'm a new member too!

I'll cancel if fewer than 3 people RSVP yes, so sign up today!
item.how_to_find_us: I drive a red car and often wear a gray hat and a gray & black winter coat if it's cold. Also, try my cell: 401-699-7304

group.name: Rhode Island Vegetarian and Vegan Meetup Group

item.name: Vegan Indian Buffet at Rasoi! New members especially welcome!
